product_name: New Balance WT10v2 Minimus Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The New Balance WT10v2 Minimus trail-running shoes for women combine the proven durability of Vibram(R) rubber outsoles with fitted, minimalist uppers for a comfortable fit with or without socks. Nylon mesh uppers with polyurethane overlays provide lightweight comfort and support. Polyester/nylon linings wick perspiration away from your feet and then dry quickly so your feet stay cool, comfortable and odor-free. WT10v2 Minimus trail-running shoes feature EVA midsoles for superb flexibility and a featherweight cushion. Vibram rubber outsoles provide lightweight performance without compromising grip or stability; updated lugs on medial sides increase traction.
short_description: The New Balance WT10v2 Minimus trail-running shoes for women combine the proven durability of Vibram(R) rubber outsoles with fitted, minimalist uppers for a comfortable fit with or without socks.
